about_the_game:
The set contains sheet music from the Silver Cats soundtracks: orchestral scores in A3 format and separately sheet music for each instrument in A4 format. The set also includes sheet music for the Magic Piano soundtracks.

Soundtracks sheet music:
1. Silver Cats OST
2. Unshed Tears Tomb
3. Swamp
4. Space of Chaos
5. Abandoned Mine
6. Guild Forest
7. Magic Forest
8. Miners Forest
9. Miners Valley
10. Nocturne №1
11. Nocturne №2
12. Nocturne №3
13. Demon Fight
14. Light Tavern

The sheet music is intended for non-commercial use. If you want to use them for commercial use, please contact the game developer. You can find more videos of the Magic Piano soundtracks recording process on the developer's YouTube channel.

Files are installed in the path Silver Cats\Silver Cats_Data\DLC\Silver Cats Scores
